title: The Garden of Earthly Delights
summary: The Garden of Earthly Delights is the modern title[lower-alpha 1] given to a triptych oil painting on oak panel painted by the Early Netherlandish master Hieronymus Bosch, between 1490 and 1510, when Bosch was between 40 and 60Â years old.[1] It has been housed in the Museo del Prado in Madrid, Spain since 1939.
